Namegiver.livingArmorOnly: This item is considered as living armor.

Hints.edid: An ID to identify an item without considering its name

EAEChangeData.key: The attribute path in the Actor or Item data which the change modifies
EAEChangeData.mode: The modification mode with which the change is applied
EAEChangeData.priority: The priority level with which this change is applied
EAEChangeData.value: The value or formula of the change effect

Info.notAddedforTheActor: This Item is not meant for this Actor.
